Description: Returns either the index position of a matched string or the string containing the matched portion.
Returns a logical vector indicating if a matched string was found.
Searches  for a specified pattern and replaces with user-specified  substring.
Returns the first position of matched pattern in a string.
Returns the position of all matched patterns in a string.
Extract substring based on matched pattern. Note that regmatches is used in conjunction with regexpr or gregexpr.
Splits strings into a list of values based on a delimiter.
Extract substring based on start and end position.
Trim whitespace on either end of string (excessive spaces)
Returns number of characters in string
Returns the number of matched patterns.
Pad string (e.g. add leading zeros to string)
